title: Dollar edges up after pullback amid caution as finance ministers meet - Economic Times
content:
1. Dollar edges up after pullback amid caution as finance ministers meet  Economic Times
  2. Dollar Up, but Below Previous Day's High, Ahead of Finance Ministers' Gathering By Investing.com  Investing.com India
  3. Dollar edges up 0.16% but cautious as finance ministers G7 meet  Business Standard
  4. FOREX-Dollar edges up after pullback amid caution as finance ministers meet  Devdiscourse
  5. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The dollar edged up on Thursday supported by expectations for aggressive Federal Reserve monetary tightening, but was well off the previous day's peaks amid nervousness about what a gathering of finance ministers might say about its rapid appreciation.
